client1 module

class client1.Client(host, port)[source]

Bases: object

create_new_user()[source]

Creates a new user with a new private key pair.

download_messages(messages_to_display, username)[source]

Downloads and saves messages received from the server to a file.

Parameters:

  • messages_to_display (str) – The messages to be downloaded.

  • username (str) – The username of the client.

load_existing_user()[source]

Loads an existing user’s private key from a file. If the file doesn’t exist or the passphrase is incorrect, prompts to create a new user.

receive_messages()[source]

Receives and displays messages from the server.

receive_public_key_and_mac_key()[source]

Receives the server’s public key and the encrypted MAC key from the server.

remove_last_line()[source]

Removes the last line printed on the console.

send_message()[source]

Sends messages from the client to the server.

start()[source]

Starts the client.

client1.decrypt_private_key(encrypted_key_data, passphrase)[source]

Decrypts an encrypted private key using a passphrase.

Parameters:

  • encrypted_key_data (bytes) – The encrypted private key data.

  • passphrase (str) – The passphrase to decrypt the private key.

Returns:

The decrypted private key or None if decryption fails.

Return type:

RSA.RsaKey or None

client1.encrypt_private_key(private_key, passphrase)[source]

Encrypts a private key using a passphrase.

Parameters:

  • private_key (RSA.RsaKey) – The private key to encrypt.

  • passphrase (str) – The passphrase to encrypt the private key.

Returns:

The encrypted private key.

Return type:

bytes
